description: Flink Metrics for skewed data and CPU intensive processing

panels.description: The number of CPU cores on each node of the cluster. This panel will be updated only if you start node_exporter "sudo systemctl [status|start|stop] node_exporter".
panels.title: # CPU cores

panels.description: The total number of Task Managers (TM) on the Flink cluster.
panels.title: Task Managers

panels.description: The total number of running jobs on the Flink cluster.
panels.title: Running Jobs

panels.description: This panel has queries for each CPU core. Hence, if the cluster has more cores available it will be necessary to add queries manually.

panels.description: This panel has queries for each CPU core. Hence, if the cluster has more cores available it will be necessary to add queries manually.
panels.title: Task Manager CPU usage per core

panels.description: This panel shows what the "top" linux command line exports to Prometheus and Grafana.
panels.title: Job Manager CPU Idle, Usage, User per node

panels.description: This panel shows what the "top" linux command line exports to Prometheus and Grafana.
panels.title: Task Manager CPU Idle, Usage, User per node

panels.description:
An interrupt request (or IRQ) is a hardware signal sent to the processor that temporarily stops a running program and allows a special program, an interrupt handler, to run instead.
IOWait - % of IOWait CPU usage on the machine.
Sys - % of System CPU usage on the machine.
Irq - % of Irq CPU usage on the machine.
Soft Irq - % of SoftIrq CPU usage on the machine.
panels.title: Job Manager CPU IO Wait, IRQ, Soft IRQ, Sys

panels.description:
An interrupt request (or IRQ) is a hardware signal sent to the processor that temporarily stops a running program and allows a special program, an interrupt handler, to run instead.
IOWait - % of IOWait CPU usage on the machine.
Sys - % of System CPU usage on the machine.
Irq - % of Irq CPU usage on the machine.
Soft Irq - % of SoftIrq CPU usage on the machine.
panels.title: Task Manager CPU IO Wait, IRQ, Soft IRQ, Sys
